column2: Formulate an ontology related to researcher. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.org/ontology#> .ex:Researcher rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Researcher" ;    rdfs:comment "An individual who conducts research." .ex:Institution rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Institution" ;    rdfs:comment "An organization where researchers conduct their work." .ex:Publication rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Publication" ;    rdfs:comment "A document presenting research findings." .ex:FieldOfStudy rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Field of Study" ;    rdfs:comment "An academic discipline within which research is conducted." .ex:hasAffiliation rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has affiliation" ;    rdfs:comment "The institution a researcher is associated with." ;    rdfs:domain ex:Researcher ;    rdfs:range ex:Institution .ex:hasPublication rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has publication" ;    rdfs:comment "The publications authored by a researcher." ;    rdfs:domain ex:Researcher ;    rdfs:range ex:Publication .ex:studiesField rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "studies field" ;    rdfs:comment "The field of study of a researcher." ;    rdfs:domain ex:Researcher ;    rdfs:range ex:FieldOfStudy .ex:publishedIn rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "published in" ;    rdfs:comment "The publication venue for a research output." ;    rdfs:domain ex:Publication ;    rdfs:range ex:PublicationVenue .ex:PublicationVenue rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Publication Venue" ;    rdfs:comment "A conference, journal, or other venue where research is published." .ex:collaboratesWith rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "collaborates with" ;    rdfs:comment "The collaboration relationship between researchers." ;    rdfs:domain ex:Researcher ;    rdfs:range ex:Researcher .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: researcher. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/researcher#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> .@prefix dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> .:Researcher rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Researcher" ;    rdfs:comment "A person who conducts scientific or scholarly research." .:hasExpertise rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Researcher ;    rdfs:range :FieldOfExpertise ;    rdfs:label "has expertise" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the researcher's field of expertise." .:FieldOfExpertise rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Field of Expertise" ;    rdfs:comment "A particular area of expertise that a researcher may have." .:affiliatedWith rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Researcher ;    rdfs:range :Institution ;    rdfs:label "affiliated with" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the institution a researcher is affiliated with." .:Institution rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Institution" ;    rdfs:comment "An organization where researchers conduct their work, such as a university or research institute." .:publishedWork rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Researcher ;    rdfs:range :Publication ;    rdfs:label "published work" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates a publication authored or co-authored by the researcher." .:Publication rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Publication" ;    rdfs:comment "A published work, such as a journal article, book, or conference paper." .:memberOfGroup rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Researcher ;    rdfs:range :ResearchGroup ;    rdfs:label "member of group" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the research group a researcher is a member of." .:ResearchGroup rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Research Group" ;    rdfs:comment "A group of researchers working collaboratively on related topics." .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: researcher.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Researcher rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Researcher" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a researcher involved in various research activities." .:hasName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Researcher ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has name" ;    rdfs:comment "The name of the researcher." .:hasFieldOfStudy rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Researcher ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has field of study" ;    rdfs:comment "The field of study or research area of the researcher." .:affiliatedWith rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Researcher ;    rdfs:range :Institution ;    rdfs:label "affiliated with" ;    rdfs:comment "The institution with which the researcher is affiliated." .:authoredPublication rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Researcher ;    rdfs:range :Publication ;    rdfs:label "authored publication" ;    rdfs:comment "A publication authored by the researcher." .:emails rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Researcher ;    rdfs:range foaf:mbox ;    rdfs:label "emails" ;    rdfs:comment "The email address of the researcher." .:Institution rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Institution" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing an academic or research institution." .:Publication rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Publication" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a research publication." .```
